channel.title: Berto Mill
channel.description:
Hi üëã I'm Berto Mill. I help businesses harness AI automation to streamline operations, reduce expenses, and maintain their competitive edge. At Makers AI Automation Partners, we deploy intelligent AI agents that revolutionize how companies work, giving teams back valuable time to concentrate on what matters most, scaling their business.

The reality is clear: companies that embrace AI will thrive, while those that don't risk being left behind. My mission is to ensure you're leading the pack, not playing catch-up. From your first steps into AI to optimizing existing systems, I'll be your trusted guide on this transformation journey.

Ready to build a smarter, more efficient business? Let's connect, schedule a consultation through my website!

videos.title: What are Subagents in Claude SDK and what do they look like in action? Claude Sessions Ep 12
videos.description:
A brief class on Subagents in the Claude Agents SDK: A Step-by-Step Guide

In this video, we dive deep into the concept of subagents within the Claude Agents SDK. Learn how to create and utilize these powerful subagents, which are specialized instances that can handle focused tasks to keep your main agent‚Äôs prompt concise and organized. We cover a practical Python example and demonstrate it with a FastAPI application and a simple HTML front end. Get insights on real-world implementation and resolve common errors. If you find this video helpful, please like and subscribe for more content!

00:00 Introduction and Overview
00:31 Understanding Subagents
01:15 Live Coding Example
03:39 Creating a FastAPI Application
09:07 Debugging and Testing
14:46 Conclusion and Next Steps

00:00 What are Subagents in Claude SDK and what do they look like in action?

videos.title: CS Ep 11: Building MCPs with Claude Agents SDK
videos.description:
Building MCP Servers with Claude Agents SDK: A Hands-On Guide

In this episode, we explore the MCP (Model Context Protocol) and the Claude Agents SDK. We'll build a practical example by setting up an MCP server using Python or TypeScript, walking through configurations for different types of MCP servers like STDIO, HTTP, and SDK MCP. Our project involves creating a local STDIO MCP server for Maker's Lounge events and an HTTP MCP server for public holiday APIs. Lastly, we aim to create an in-process SDK MCP server for custom calculations. Join us for a practical coding session to enhance your knowledge of AI agents and their extended capabilities. Connect with me on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/bertomill/ and follow me on X: https://x.com/berto_vmill.

00:00 Introduction and Overview
00:32 Understanding MCP and Claude Agents SDK
01:14 Setting Up an MCP Server
02:38 Building an STTDIO Server
05:18 Creating an HTTP MCP Server
16:25 Developing an In-Process SDK MCP Server
19:49 Conclusion and Final Thoughts

videos.title: Claude Agents SDK: The Public Holiday API Server Concept
videos.description:
Setting Up an HTTP MCP Server with a Public Holiday API

Join us as we explore the idea of setting up an HTTP MCP server using a public holiday API. We discuss the advantages of using an easy-to-access API for event planning and provide a basic configuration example. Follow along as we install and run our agent to check upcoming events and holidays.

00:00 Introduction to MCP Server Ideas
00:38 Choosing the Right API for MCP Server
00:56 Deciding on the Public Holiday API
01:31 Setting Up the HTTP MCP Server
02:31 Running the Agent and Viewing Events

videos.description:
üåü Connect with me on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/bertomill/ and follow my x: https://x.com/berto_vmill. Join me as I demonstrate how to move beyond basic coding by building a practical email drafting assistant using Claude's versatile system prompts. In this episode, we prioritize creating a formal email drafter that leverages recent templates for consistency. We dive into the process of setting this up using the append method with Claude Code's built-in tools. Watch to see the detailed steps and powerful impact of customizing Claude's behavior!

videos.title: 1 Will Tom Brady Say Yes? Our Podcast Gamble
videos.description:
In this video, I demonstrate how to use an AI tool named Whisper Flow to draft an email inviting Tom Brady to join my podcast. The video walks through the process of modifying the system prompt for the AI to ensure it follows a specific template and tone. I also show how to fine-tune the email's UI appearance to match an app called Linear. Additionally, I highlight the value of system prompts in creating consistent and professional communication. Watch until the end for tips on how to practice and improve your own AI-driven email automation.

videos.description:
Unlock the Power of Custom Claude Agents SDK System Prompts

üåü Learn how to harness the Claude Agents SDK framework to customize system prompts, making your AI agents more functional and versatile for business tasks beyond coding. I‚Äôll walk you through creating a web app where we interact with a Claude assistant, focusing on building an email drafting tool with formal templates, and demonstrate both the append method and fully custom system prompts. Watch as we also create a sleek iOS-themed web UI for a better user experience. Don't forget to hit the links and join the AI automation community! üìå Connect with me on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/bertomill/ and X: https://x.com/berto_vmill.

videos.title: CS8: Hosting the Agent SDK in Containers
videos.description:
Mastering Claude Agent SDK: Hosting, Security, and Deployment

Hey everyone! Welcome to Claude Sessions number eight. In this video, we'll delve into hosting agents in containers, focusing on the Claude Agent SDK. We'll cover key concepts like why hosting is vital, sandbox providers, and creating a simple agent with Python or Node.js. Follow along as I walk you through setting up and running an agent in a sandbox environment, ensuring security, scalability, and persistence. Toward the end, we'll discuss making it live online. Don't miss out on these foundational lessons to elevate your skills. Be sure to like and subscribe!

videos.title: Berto Mill Live Stream
CS EP6: Checkpointing with Claude Agents SDK
videos.description:
Mastering Checkpoints in the Claude Agents SDK | Real-life Example & Practical Guide

Github url: https://github.com/bertomill/file-checkpointing-demo

Live site: https://presentation-bertmill19s-projects.vercel.app

In this episode, we delve into the concept of checkpoints in the Claude Agents SDK. Discover how to implement and benefit from checkpointing to manage and revert changes efficiently in your AI projects. We'll present a real-life example with Mounting Gear Co. to illustrate applying discounts and reverting changes, all with simple lines of code. Learn how checkpointing can become your safety net for business processes, auditing, and technical workflows. Explore key takeaways and next steps to elevate your understanding and application of the Claude Agents SDK.

00:00 Introduction and Overview
00:05 Understanding Claude Checkpoints
01:50 Practical Application Example
02:51 Implementing Checkpointing in Code
03:29 Key Takeaways and Applications
04:04 Next Steps and Conclusion

videos.title: The Crucial Role of Checkpoints in Claude Agents SDK Development
videos.description:
Mastering Checkpointing in AG Agentic Coding - Essential for Business Automation

In this episode, we dive into the practical necessity of checkpointing when developing with agents for real-world business use cases. Learn how traditional methods like using control Z or git commits fall short when dealing with rapid, multi-file changes made by agents like Claude. Discover the practical approach of implementing checkpoints in your code to streamline processes and make reverts easy. We use a 'Mounting Gear Co.' example to demonstrate how checkpointing can effectively manage mass updates, such as applying Black Friday discounts to various products, and provide key takeaways to help you audit and trace agent decisions efficiently.

00:00 Introduction to Agentic Coding and Checkpointing
00:32 Importance of Checkpointing in Development
01:06 Real-Life Example: Mounting Gear Co.
02:08 Implementing Checkpointing in Code
02:45 Key Takeaways and Benefits of Checkpointing

00:00 The Crucial Role of Checkpoints in Claude Agents SDK Development

videos.title: CS Ep 5: Understanding Claude Agent Hooks and Guardrails
videos.description:
Mastering Hooks in Claude Agent's SDK: A Comprehensive Guide

In this video, we delve into hooks within the Claude Agent's SDK, exploring their functionality and significance. We'll use analogies, real-life examples, and deep dives into the code to illustrate how hooks can prevent unwanted actions and ensure safe operations. From a developer's story about safeguarding sensitive data to explaining the different types of hooks and their uses, this tutorial covers all essentials. Whether you're a beginner or looking to enhance your knowledge, you'll learn how to set up hooks effectively and ensure secure coding practices using the Claude Agent's SDK.

00:00 Introduction to Hooks in Claude Agent's SDK
00:36 Understanding Hooks with an Analogy
01:40 Real-World Example of Hooks
02:24 Deep Dive into Hook Code
03:10 Real-Life Story: Alex's Experience

videos.title: CS Ep 4: Guardrails and Permissions in Claude Agents SDK
videos.description:
Mastering Permissions with the Claude Agents SDK: A Comprehensive Guide

Web app: https://claude-agents-permissions.vercel.app

Claude: https://platform.claude.com/docs/en/agent-sdk/overview

Hey everyone! In this episode, we dive deep into how to handle permissions using the Claude Agents SDK. We'll start with an overview and the importance of permissions, followed by permission flow diagrams, permission modes, and the 'can use tool' hook. We'll also cover handling the 'ask user' question tool and explore some related resources. Using a custom web app, we demonstrate real-life examples and different permission settings like read-only, accepting edits, bypassing permissions, and using hooks to prevent harmful actions. Test your knowledge with a quiz provided in the YouTube chat and check the description for relevant links and resources. If you enjoy this content, please like and subscribe to support the channel!

00:00 Introduction and Overview
00:39 Importance of Permissions
01:11 Real-Life Examples and Quiz
01:42 Code Examples and Permission Modes
02:49 Advanced Permission Handling
04:02 Wrap Up and Real-World Scenarios

Mastering Claude Agent SDK: Streaming vs. Single Message Inputs Explained

Hey everyone! In this episode, we delve into the key concept of streaming with the Claude Agent SDK. We'll explore how to set up a persistent connection with Claude, enabling you to ask multiple questions at once and receive real-time feedback. You'll see a practical demonstration of streaming mode versus single message input mode, understanding their applications and benefits. Follow along as we set up our project, install the Claude Agent SDK, and walk through practical examples. If you enjoy this video, please like and subscribe for more insights into using Claude effectively!

videos.title: Building a AI Sales Coach with N8N and Vapi
videos.description:
Connect with me on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/robertvmill/

Cold call outbound training where SDRs practice against an AI prospect
Inbound call training where reps answer customer questions about products
Real-time AI evaluation scoring discovery, objection handling, tone, and more
Live dashboard showing training results and performance metrics

How It Works:

SDR calls a VAPI phone number and practices a cold call scenario
AI prospect responds realistically, throws objections, and evaluates the call
n8n workflow extracts the transcript and passes it to GPT-4 for evaluation
AI coach scores the SDR on 5+ criteria (discovery, objection handling, tone, etc.)
Results save to Supabase and display on a beautiful Next.js dashboard

Tech Stack:

ü§ñ VAPI - AI voice agent for realistic prospect conversations
üîÑ n8n - Workflow automation to process transcripts and evaluations
üß† OpenAI GPT-4 - AI coach providing scoring and feedback
üíæ Supabase - Database for storing training results
üé® Next.js/Vercel - Beautiful dashboard for managers

Perfect For:
‚úÖ Sales teams wanting to train reps without a trainer
‚úÖ Recruitment firms screening candidates
‚úÖ Real estate companies improving cold calling skills
‚úÖ Any sales organization needing scalable training
Links:

VAPI: https://vapi.ai
n8n: https://n8n.io
Supabase: https://supabase.com
Next.js: https://nextjs.org

#SalesTraining #AITraining #VoiceAgent #Automation #n8n #VAPI

videos.title: AI Newsletter automation
videos.description:
How to Automate Your Newsletter with NAN and AI

In this tutorial, I walk you through the process of building a newsletter automation using the NAN platform. We start with a schedule trigger that sends a form to gather necessary information. This includes major accomplishments and AI-related news harvested from an RSS feed. The collected data is then processed and filtered for key details, merged, and cleaned. The AI agent generates a cover image using the Open Router's Gemini Flash model and all the information is compiled into a Notion page. The final result is a fully automated newsletter ready to be viewed on my portfolio website's newsletter section.

00:00 Introduction and Overview
00:07 Setting Up the Schedule Trigger
00:28 Filling Out the Form
00:47 Integrating AI News and Processing
01:36 Generating and Publishing the Newsletter

videos.title: N8N helped me automate my LinkedIn messages
videos.description:
In this episode, the host demonstrates a powerful N8N automation workflow designed for client outreach. N8N, an open-source workflow builder, allows users to create visual workflows integrating various tools like Slack, Postgres, and JIRA. The demonstration focuses on a LinkedIn outreach application that personalizes messages based on users' previous posts. The workflow involves webhooks, AI parsing, metadata addition, message generation, and saving data to Notion. Additionally, the host explains how to build the workflow using Claude Desktop and GitHub for enhanced automation and efficiency.

Github: https://github.com/bertomill/linkedin-form-n8n
My weekly newsletter: https://magic.beehiiv.com/v1/758ce67a-c75e-4657-b87c-b2037ed0b497?email={{email}}
My LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/robertvmill/
Link to site: https://postreachout.vercel.app/

videos.title: This New AI Tool is going to 10X your coding productivity (BMAD method)
videos.description:
Revolutionize Your Development Process with the Bmad Method! 

In this video, we unveil the Bmad Method, a groundbreaking framework designed to enhance the efficiency of coders and software development teams using AI. The Bmad Method employs a group of specialized agents that function as an agile team, with roles like scrum master, developer, and designer, operating within an orchestrated platform. This method facilitates seamless project progression from setup to completion by automating and structuring tasks into epics and subtasks. Watch to learn how to install, set up, and leverage this method for developing comprehensive, well-structured applications effortlessly.

videos.title: Building a Cursor-AI Support Agent
videos.description:
Building a Customer Support Agent with Coding, Cursor, and AI

In this episode, we walk through the process of building a customer support agent using coding, Cursor, and AI technologies. We start by creating a TS config file and setting up the project environment, including installing the Masra MMCP server and configuring OpenAI keys. We also integrate various tools like ticket management, email templates, and WebSocket for real-time interactions. Additional functionalities include setting up a knowledge base service and time server for a comprehensive support system. Watch to learn how you can automate customer support efficiently!

videos.title: Prompting tips to improve your website
videos.description:
Looking to make your website stand out with some creative components? Often times AI website builders build very stock websites without much flair or creativity. In this video I show two techniques to improve your website with AI.
1. Have a conversation with AI about what you want done - the AI is better at generating the prompt if you go back and forth with it, working out the details together.
2. Feed screenshots of websites you like into the AI chat to better curate the prompt.

Link to prompt: https://bertomill.ca/prompts
Github repo: https://github.com/bertomill/my-portfolio
Connect with me: https://www.linkedin.com/in/bertomill/

videos.title: How do AI Agents Actually Work (July 2025)
videos.description:
Confused about AI agents and workflows? In this video, I break down the key differences between predetermined AI workflows and autonomous AI agents. Learn when agents excel at complex tasks like financial analysis and research, versus when workflows dominate for repeatable operations.

topVideos.title: This New AI Tool is going to 10X your coding productivity (BMAD method)
topVideos.description:
Revolutionize Your Development Process with the Bmad Method! 

In this video, we unveil the Bmad Method, a groundbreaking framework designed to enhance the efficiency of coders and software development teams using AI. The Bmad Method employs a group of specialized agents that function as an agile team, with roles like scrum master, developer, and designer, operating within an orchestrated platform. This method facilitates seamless project progression from setup to completion by automating and structuring tasks into epics and subtasks. Watch to learn how to install, set up, and leverage this method for developing comprehensive, well-structured applications effortlessly.

Link to Github repository: https://github.com/bmad-code-org/BMAD-METHOD

00:00 Introduction to an Exciting New Tool
00:18 Introducing the Bmad Method
00:18 Overview of the Bmad Method
00:20 How the Bmad Method Works
01:05 Benefits of the Bmad Method
01:13 Demonstration and Project Build
01:18 Setting Up the Bmad Method
02:20 Working with Agents

06:14 Final Thoughts and Conclusion

topVideos.title: N8N helped me automate my LinkedIn messages
topVideos.description:
In this episode, the host demonstrates a powerful N8N automation workflow designed for client outreach. N8N, an open-source workflow builder, allows users to create visual workflows integrating various tools like Slack, Postgres, and JIRA. The demonstration focuses on a LinkedIn outreach application that personalizes messages based on users' previous posts. The workflow involves webhooks, AI parsing, metadata addition, message generation, and saving data to Notion. Additionally, the host explains how to build the workflow using Claude Desktop and GitHub for enhanced automation and efficiency.

Github: https://github.com/bertomill/linkedin-form-n8n
My weekly newsletter: https://magic.beehiiv.com/v1/758ce67a-c75e-4657-b87c-b2037ed0b497?email={{email}}
My LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/robertvmill/
Link to site: https://postreachout.vercel.app/

00:00 Introduction and Overview of N8N
00:58 Building the Post Reach Out App
02:27 Demonstration of the Workflow
05:16 Technical Details and Code Sharing
06:45 Final Tips and Hosting
07:14 Conclusion and Contact Information

topVideos.title: Claude Sessions Ep 2: Getting started with the Claude Agents SDK
topVideos.description:
Boost Your Coding Efficiency with Claude Agents SDK - Quick Start Guide

If you like this content, please like and subscribe!

In this video, we dive into the Claude Agents SDK, formerly known as Claude Code SDK. Learn how to install and set up the SDK, create specialized agents to autonomously read files, run commands, search the web, edit code, and more. We'll walk through a quick start guide and demonstrate how Claude can help you improve coding efficiency by tailoring agents to your specific codebase and workflows. Discover how to create and run an agent to fix bugs, and explore the powerful capabilities, including web research integration, that Claude offers for automating and enhancing your coding processes.

00:00 Introduction to Claude Agents SDK
01:12 Setting Up Your Environment
02:06 Creating and Configuring Agents
04:05 Running and Testing Your Agent
05:14 Advanced Features and Customization
08:04 Conclusion and Next Steps
